long_description: Hammer Nutrition Anti-Fatigue caps help you stay strong throughout the day by removing energy-robbing ammonia that accummulates during extended exercise. Excess ammonia interferes with glycogen production and thereby disrupts your energy output. Anti-Fatique caps contain potassium magnesium aspartate, L-citrulline and ornithine alpha-ketoglutarate to scavenge ammonia and help produce energy-boosting glutamine. Take 2 - 4 capsules 1 hr. prior to workouts or races, and 1 capsule per hr. during workouts or races. Capsules are made from an all-vegetable material. Gluten free. Bottle contains 90 capsules. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Hammer Nutrition Anti-Fatigue caps help you stay strong throughout the day by removing energy-robbing ammonia that accummulates during extended exercise.
